DOC.brief_summary: Specific aim project follow : 1 . To investigate eye-head coordination patient cervical spine degeneration . 2 . To investigate relationship impairment measurement ( range motion , muscle power , proprioception , sensory threshold , eye-head coordination ) functional outcome ( neck disability index , quality life evaluation ) . 3 . To develop computer assistant device software proprioceptive training eye-head coordination . 4 . To provide treatment prevention program emphasize proprioception treatment coordination employee neck-shoulder complaint .
DOC.criteria: Group one : participant without degenerated disease cervical spine Group two : participant degenerate disease cervical spine Grade III , IV degenerate cervical spine
